headline: Byrna Technologies (BYRN) Expands Board with Former Nike VP and Public Safety Veteran
summary: Last week, Byrna Technologies (BYRN) appointed Adam Roth and TJ Kennedy to its Board of Directors. These appointments are poised to enhance the company's strengths in brand building and public safety technology, reflecting BYRN's goals to bolster its consumer reach and market position. However, this leadership change coincided with a 7% decline in BYRN's share price, contrasting with the broader market, which saw indices such as the S&P 500 hitting all-time highs. While the market experienced...

headline: Byrna (BYRN) Stock Trades Up, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of non-lethal weapons company Byrna (NASDAQ:BYRN) jumped 3.7% in the morning session after the company announced the appointment of two new members to its Board of Directors.

headline: Nike shares lifted to Buy as TD Cowen highlights cyclical recovery
summary: Investing.com -- Nike shares are trading around 1.6% higher premarket on Wednesday after TD Cowen upgraded the stock to Buy, highlighting the company’s “iconic global brand in sport at trough margins with $4+ in EPS/$6B in FCF potential” and underappreciated margin recovery, citing improvements under the new management team and improving data trends.
